question: Will everyone qualify for Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
text:
Will everyone qualify for Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
          
        
The same eligibility rules apply for coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace as they did on healthcare.gov. All Virginia residents who are otherwise eligible, will be able to enroll in coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace during the Open Enrollment Period, which goes from
November 1  January 15
each year. Virginia residents experiencing a qualifying life event may be able to enroll outside of Open Enrollment using a Special Enrollment Period.
